DataElement.preferredName: Patient Pre-existing Condition Impairment Consent Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to permission obtained from an individual to collect a information regarding preexisting loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to permission obtained from an individual to collect a information regarding preexisting loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A health condition or medical problem that was diagnosed or treated before a specific date.:Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A health condition or medical problem that was diagnosed or treated before a specific date.
Loss or abnormality of psychological, physiological, or anatomic structure or function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the patient under treatmen
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient under treatment for medical disorders, that, in the opinion of the P-I would affect the patient's judgment of post-operative hypersensitivity and ability to understand the informed consent process

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the subject under treatment for medical disorders including dementia, Parkinson's disease, severe depression, severe anxiety, and any other medical condition that, in the opinion of the P-I, would affect the subject's judgment of post-operative hypersensitivity and/or ability to understand the informed consent process

DataElement.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: 10/10/14 CDE versioned to use Standard Indicator VD. jc 8/19/14 Released CDE with retired VD for review. jc
